definition[0]: used when you do not understand what someone is doing or why they are doing it, and you are surprised or annoyed
example[0]: What do you think you’re playing at?
definition[1]: if you play at doing something, you do not do it properly or seriously
example[1]: He’s still playing at being an artist.
definition[2]: if children play at doctors, soldiers etc, they pretend to be doctors, soldiers etc
example[2]: a 14-year-old playing at being a grown woman
